channel.title: Custom items disappearing on attack. [SOLVED]
channel.description:
Hello, I need help. :(
When I attack with my custom items, such as dragon claws they disappear and do like the punching emote. Can someone please tell me how to fix this, as it's quite annoying. I have the claws animation I'd like to use for my claws - 2847.
Thanks! Help Appreciated! :)
Fast responses please! If you read, post! :confused:

item.title: Custom items disappearing on attack. [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @pure_kirk pure kirk
item.description:
@pure_kirk wrote:

what do u have delta?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 24, 2009, 04:51:12 am[/size][hr]because if u have delta go search getwepanim then write
if(id == ####)
{
return ****;
}
at #### write the claws model id which is 2847
and at **** write the emote u wish to use
btw can u tell me the emote im having trouble finding 1

Read full topic
